comments:
Build ID: I20070222-0951

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open a project
2. Click build project



More information:
Platform: MacOSX 10.4.8
"Make" Project using scons

The build continues correctly. And it only seems to happen the first time you build the project. After that hitting build doesn't produce the error.

Error Log:
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no spawner in java.library.path

This wouldn't happen to be an Intel Mac would it. We still don't have support for Intel Macs. There is another bug open on this, I'll have to look it up.

It is an Intel Mac, that might be part of the problem.

Was unaware that the Intel Mac was unsupported.
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
